translation.Message_0_Page_0: Basic tools include: pocket knife - used to tear clothing items and hammer - used to break down most items into basic components. They can commonbly be found around.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Toolbox is used to craft various supplies and buildables, it's also used to break down certain rare items, it can be rarely found in construction locations. Reloading tools are used to craft ammunition. Rewire kit is used to craft high tier explosives.
